title: Seabound
description: Seabound is an exquisitely animated journey into a forgotten, grinding ocean, where a weeping boat carries a haunting past. Donna Kendrigan's imaginative puppets are intriguing characters, whose beauty is complimented by the film's delicately constructed sets.
